long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸš€ Upload Entire Folders to Claude AI While Preserving Project Structure!

Enhance your conversations with Claude AI by maintaining your project's context through preserved file paths and directory structures. This extension intelligently uploads your folders by keeping filenames with their full path information, allowing Claude to understand the relationships between files and their organization.

Key Features:
âœ¨ SMART PATH PRESERVATION - Files retain their full directory path (e.g., "src/components/Button.jsx")
âœ¨ CONTEXT AWARENESS - Claude can understand file relationships through preserved directory structure
âœ¨ PROJECT ORGANIZATION - Files appear with their full paths, making it clear which files belong where
âœ¨ INTELLIGENT FILTERING - Automatically excludes irrelevant files (.git, node_modules, etc.)
âœ¨ BULK FILE MANAGEMENT - Remove multiple files with one click
âœ¨ CUSTOM EXCLUSIONS - Add your own file patterns to exclude
âœ¨ PROGRESS TRACKING - Real-time upload and deletion progress

Perfect for:
â€¢ Software Developers sharing complex project structures
â€¢ Researchers organizing hierarchical document collections
â€¢ Technical Writers maintaining documentation trees
â€¢ Data Scientists with structured datasets
â€¢ Anyone needing to maintain file organization with Claude
